comments.author: beelzebub.dub@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10_5_8; en-us) AppleWebKit/533.19.4 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0.3 Safari/533.19.4
Build Identifier: 3.6.16 Mac OSX

Composing an email using Mobile Me, when entering in email address, or subject line, I get a continuous error message of "This web page is being redirected to a new location. Would you like to resend the form data you have typed to the new location?" I hit "OK" "Cancel" over and over, and everytime i add a letter to either section this keeps popping up endlessly.

Reproducible: Sometimes

Steps to Reproduce:
1. log in to mobile me (through website)
2. compose new email (or respond to old one)
3.
Actual Results:  
same error of "This web page is being redirected to a new location. Would you like to resend the form data you have typed to the new location?" came up when trying to type email address in.

Expected Results:  
just let me enter in email without redirect error.
comments.creator: beelzebub.dub@gmail.com
